titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 2000 relating Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia, home preservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/8/2001--Introduced. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 2000 to remove the floor elevation condition for the release from an easement prohibition of eligible property owners of existing habitation structures on land acquired by the United States for the Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia, project.
